node.detail_zh: 患者屬堅城（梁氏）建築群組，無外遊紀錄，7 月 23 日出現症狀。
node.detail_en: The patient is part of the Kin Shing (Leung's) General Contractors Ltd cluster, has no travel history, and developed symptoms on July 23.

groups.name_zh:
堅城（梁氏）建築有限公司 /
創紀之城 3 期
groups.name_en:
Kin Shing (Leung's) General
Contractors Ltd. / Millennium City 3
groups.description_zh: 堅城（梁氏）建築在觀塘創紀之城 3 期有辦公室，大部分人在該處工作；另有零星地盤工人及其家屬受感染，資料顯示確診地盤工人並非在同一地方工作。其後創紀之城 3 期其他公司員工及清潔工亦有人確診。
groups.description_en: Most patients of this cluster works at the office of Kin Shing (Leung's) General Contractors Ltd at Millennium City 3; a few other involved are construction workers who do not report to that office, as well as their family members. Other office workers and janitors at Millennium City 3 were also diagnosed later on.
